lead_paragraph: CALLO--Dominick F.,beloved husband, stepfather, and friend, passed away on April 28, 2016, at the age of 85, with his adoring wife, Mary Loving, by his side. A lifelong New Yorker, Mr. Callo was a veteran of the Korean War and retired lieutenant with the New York City Fire Department. He earned a law degree from Brooklyn Law School and maintained a successful private practice for more than five decades. He was admired for his humor, extraordinary rhetorical skill, and devotion and loyalty to friends and family. The son of the late Giocondo and Eleanora, Mr. Callo is survived by his wife and stepchildren Alex and Cameron, granddaughter Sydney, brother-in- law Jerome, sister-in-law Cathy, cousins Anny and Franco, and extended family here and in Italy. Friends may call at Frank E. Campbell Funeral Home, 1076 Madison Avenue (81 St.) Tuesday 5-7:30pm. Services, Wednesday 10am at funeral home. "Salute." He did it his way. 1/3
